attributes.action: LOWER THE SMEAR TEST AGE TO 16
attributes.additional_details:
I want the government to change the age from 25 to 16 as cervical cancer doesn’t pick and choose people based on age. There isn’t enough information for young girls out there, and there are a lot of young women who have cervical cancer but are turned away as they aren’t 25 years old yet. 

WE DESERVE TO KNOW WHAT IS GOING ON INSIDE OUR BODIES!!
attributes.background: I want the government to lower womens smear test age in the UK to 16.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325302
